statements: SELECT * FROM cultural_organization;
SELECT name, donation_amount FROM cultural_organization WHERE member_count > 100;
SELECT id, name FROM cultural_organization ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_organization WHERE donation_amount >= 1000;
SELECT name, member_count FROM cultural_organization WHERE donation_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM cultural_organization WHERE member_count > 100 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT name, donation_amount FROM cultural_organization WHERE member_count BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT id, name FROM cultural_organization WHERE donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY member_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM cultural_organization WHERE donation_amount < 1000 AND member_count > 50 ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, name, member_count, donation_amount FROM cultural_organization WHERE member_count <= 50 OR donation_amount = 0.00 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM members
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name FROM members
SELECT email, phone_number FROM members
SELECT * FROM donations
SELECT member_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations
SELECT * FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM members WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, first_name, last_name, donation_amount FROM members JOIN donations ON members.member_id = donations.member_id WHERE donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, donation_amount FROM members LEFT JOIN donations ON members.member_id = donations.member_id WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(member_id) AS total_members, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM members JOIN donations ON members.member_id = donations.member_id;
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT name, email FROM Members;
SELECT * FROM Donations WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT event_id, name, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT member_id, name, join_date FROM Members WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT name, email FROM Members WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT donation_id, amount, donation_date FROM Donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, name, location, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT m.name AS member_name, d.amount AS donation_amount, e.name AS event_name FROM Members m JOIN Donations d ON m.member_id = d.member_id JOIN Events e ON d.amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, event_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT member_id, name FROM Members ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT email FROM Members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Registrations WHERE member_id = 3 AND event_id = 2;
SELECT name, email FROM Members;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT name, event_name, registration_date FROM Members JOIN Registrations ON Members.member_id = Registrations.member_id JOIN Events ON Registrations.event_id = Events.event_id;
SELECT * FROM Members JOIN Registrations ON Members.member_id = Registrations.member_id WHERE Members.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY Members.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM membership;
SELECT member_name, join_date FROM membership ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, join_date FROM membership WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM donation WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT member_name FROM membership WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, donation_amount FROM membership JOIN donation ON membership.member_id = donation.member_id WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM event JOIN ticket ON event.event_id = ticket.event_id WHERE ticket_price < 50;
SELECT member_name, subscription_amount FROM membership JOIN monthly_subscription ON membership.member_id = monthly_subscription.member_id WHERE subscription_amount >= 20 ORDER BY member_name ASC;
